about: really really love the Avicus network. If I could I would play it 24/7. Sometimes I wish I was a mod because I always encounter people that seem to hack. I am nice but don't like when people mess with my buildings!!! That's just wrong. If a mod is reading this pleas skype me at dspuli24 so I can ask u some question about the server. GO MOOSHROOMS!!!!!!  We will rule the world!!!DUBSTEP!!!!!!!DUBSTEP!!!!!!!
